title: Looking for a top/jg who can LISTEN
body:
We are looking for someone who is very active and can listen and play how we need them to.

Bronze silver or gold only.

Must have a mic and be able to use teamspeak.

Someone who is comfortable with tanky cc junglers/tops is preferred.

ign: whitepumah

replies.body: Yea, I can play poppy top pretty well and if u want I can also play really good elise jungle but I only go full tank after I get my runic echoes and rylai's

Gold 5 and main top lane and mid. Dont jg often but can do a fair few of em {{champion:9}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:5}} 

Play these sexy fellows at top lane {{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:62}}
